sentences.en: And the home's physician will be there to attest to her mental competency?
sentences.cn: 她的家庭医生也会在那里证实她的神智能力 吗 ?

sentences.en: Conclusion: It is necessary to attest the quality standard.
sentences.cn: 结论: 质量标准的认证是必要的.

sentences.en: Contemporary accounts attest to his courage and determination.
sentences.cn: 当时的报道证实了他的勇气和决心。

sentences.en: Do you have any friends who can attest to your character?
sentences.cn: 你有任何朋友可以为你的性格做证 吗 ?

sentences.en: His achievements attest his devotion to science.
sentences.cn: 他的成就是他对科学的献身精神的明证.
他的工作表明他的勤奋.

sentences.en: Historic documents attest to the truth of this legend.
sentences.cn: 历史文件见证这个传说的真实性.

sentences.en: I can attest to the absolute truth of his statement.
sentences.cn: 我可以证实他的话是千真万确的.

sentences.en: I can personally attest that the cold and flu season is here.
sentences.cn: 感冒和流感季节来了，对此我有切身体会。

sentences.en: I have said nothing that I am not ready to attest.
sentences.cn: 我发誓,我说的话句句属实.

sentences.en: Police records attest to his long history of violence.
sentences.cn: 警方记录证明他有长期的暴力史。

sentences.en: Several witnesses can attest to her good character.
sentences.cn: 好几位证人证实她品行端正.

sentences.en: These points fully attest to the rarity of the painting.
sentences.cn: 这也说明此图珍贵之所在.

sentences.en: THUNDERSTORMS are notoriously unpredictable, as many a drenched picnicker can attest.
sentences.cn: 雷暴真是人所共知的难以预料, 正如许多湿透了的野餐者证实的那样.

sentences.en: To attest the VAT invoice from Shanghai to Tax bureau.
sentences.cn: 从上海向税务局递交增值税发票.

sentences.en: Two Ph . D . theses attest to the results of his work.
sentences.cn: 有两篇哲学 博士 论文论证了他的研究结果.

words.tran_cn: 证明无病的；经检验证明无病的；经检验证明无菌的
证明者；契据等的连属人

trans.tran_en: to show or prove that something is true

trans.tran_cn: 宣称…为真实的，证明，证实，作证，使宣誓，使发誓
